Description.Text: An ideal choice for quality accommodation, Fitzpatrick Manhattan Hotel allows guests to enjoy all that the city has to offer. A must-visit attraction for art lovers is the Museum Of Modern Art, which is also popularly known as MoMA. Visitors can explore the famous concert venue, Carnegie Hall or the United Nations complex that houses the Dag Hammarskjold Library. They can also visit Chrysler Building, a skyscraper built in Art Deco style.

• Dahesh Museum - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi • Sony Wonder Technology Lab - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi • Tiffany & Co. - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi • St. Patrick's Cathedral - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi • Museum of Modern Art - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi • Rockefeller Plaza - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi • Chrysler Building - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi • Grand Central Terminal - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi • Broadway - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi • Times Square - 1.5 km / 1 mi • Empire State Building - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi • Central Park - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi • Brooklyn Bridge - 6.7 km / 4.1 mi • Ellis Island - 9.1 km / 5.6 mi • Statue of Liberty - 10.2 km / 6.3 mi

This New York City boutique hotel offers 91 richly decorated rooms and suites with pillowtop mattresses and duvets, rosewood furniture, crown moldings, and marble bathrooms including telephones and terry-cloth bathrobes. Suites feature living rooms with sofa beds, separate bedrooms, wet bars, and compact refrigerators. Additional guestroom amenities include in-room safes, iPod docks, CD players, two-line telephones, and 37-inch flat-screen TVs. Wireless Internet access (surcharge), pay movies, and video games (surcharge) are also provided.

Pets not allowed Check-in time is 3 PM Check-out time is Noon

The Fitz - Locally popular bar serving breakfast, lunch, and dinner. The menu offers a variety of cuisines from Irish classics to modern American. Drinks and food available until late evening.
